info.title: Contact Person Service
info.description: Contact persons are individuals you have direct interactions with for your business to be successful. Contacts mostly have a relationship with a corporate account and they are involved in business processes such as activities, orders, and opportunities. With the contact entity and its dedicated subentities you can access and modify all central and related information of a contact (master data).

servers.description: Example of server url is https://my1234567.crm.cloud.sap

get.summary: Query contact person records in the system
get.description: Specify query parameters to return desired contact person records from the system.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Skip the first n contact persons.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Show only the first n contact persons.

parameters.name: $search
parameters.description: Search for a string within contact persons.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Indicates if count of contact persons to be returned.

parameters.name: $query
parameters.description: Run a specific query in contact person service.

200.description: Contact persons retrieved from the system

400.description: Contact person cannot be retrieved from the system. The request sent to the system is invalid.

401.description:
Unauthorized.

This error is caused when the request has not been applied because there are no valid authentication credentials for the target resource.

403.description: User is not authorized to query contact persons in the system. Check user's authorization under Settings - Users and Control - Business Roles

500.description:
Internal Server Error.

Failed to query contact persons.

501.description: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.

post.description: Send contact person information to the system to create a new contact person.

two.summary: Create a contact with assignment to account and communication data.

201.description: A new contact person is created in the system.

400.description: Contact person is not created in the system. The request sent to the system is invalid.

401.description: User is not authenticated to create a new contact person in the system.

403.description: User is not authorized to create a contact person in the system. Check user's authorization under Settings - Users and Control - Business Roles

500.description: Failed to create a contact person due to an internal server error.

get.description: Read a specific contact person using the contact person ID.

200.description: Contact person with the requested ID is found in the system.

400.description: Invalid Request. Failed to read the contact person information.

401.description: User is not authenticated to read the contact person information in the system.

403.description: User is not authorized to read contact person information in the system. Check user's authorization under Settings - Users and Control - Business Roles

404.description: Contact person with the request ID is not found in the system.

500.description: Failed to read the account due to an internal server error.

patch.summary: Update an existing contact person information
patch.description: Update contact person attributes in the system.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Used for conflict management when a consumer tries to update a resource. This parameter checks if the state of the resource known to the client (etag) matches the state on the server and if true, allows the update to continue.

400.description: Invalid request. Failed to update the contact person.

401.description: User is not authenticated to update the contact person in the system.

403.description: User is not authorized to update the contact person in the system. Check user's authorization under Settings - Users and Control - Business Roles

412.description: Failed to update the contact person. The contact person was updated in a parallel session. Try again with a new if-match http header value.

428.description: Failed to update the contact person. The mandatory http header if-match was not sent in http request header.

500.description: Failed to update the account due to an internal server error.

x-sap-shortText: Manage entities from the contact person service

x-sap-extensible.description: You can create extension fields in the contactPerson API by following the steps mentioned in https://help.sap.com/docs/CX_NG_SVC/2c87cece32844c91836e535aef8f9642/d3bdfac0c6b141c0bac27408c3ed159f.html?locale=en-US. The newly created extensions will be available in the API request and response body.
